articles.author: Anthony D'Alessandro
articles.title: ‘Wild Robot’ Uploading $35M Opening; ‘Megalopolis’ Debuts Behind India’s ‘Devara Part One’ – Friday Box Office Update - Deadline
articles.description: 'The Wild Robot' is outperforming its box office projection with a $35M opening while Francis Ford Coppola's 'Megalopolis' is bombing with under $5M at the weekend domestic box office.
articles.content: FRIDAY AFTERNOON: DreamWorks/Universal’s The Wild Robotis currently overperforming according to Friday afternoon projections, evidence of the IP’s popularity with kids. The Chris Sanders movie is eye… [+5974 chars]
